name: House of Disharmony
description: A kid that misled by some unknown whispers, walks into House of Disharmony, unprepared to what happens... There is a story about this haunted house that gives disharmony name. Once upon a time, there was a kid, living in this house with her family. They live in village but their house is a little bit far. They were very happy to have each others and spending good times. One day at midnight, they were heard some voices deeply far from them but they ignored it. That was a huge mistake. In that time, thiefs were planning to robb that house. They entered to house when family sleeping. Thiefs were began to steal some stuffs like plate, glass, knife etc... At this moment, a little kid came out from a room. They didn't realized the kid so didn't kid too. Kid was planning to go toilet but she realized some difference in room, some dark shapes. She could have scream but that interrupted by thief and slashed her throat. Kid was dying slowly and quitely. When it happens ,  kid was carrying her toy. When kid dead , she dropped it from hands and thiefs heard that toy began to sing. They suddenly tried to break it but it was too late. Mother and father came out from other door and they attacked to thiefs. Father was got his hunter weapon after woke up. They killed all thiefs. When they see their daughter as dead, they were destroyed. Next day they burried their daughter to garden. They called priest for cursing thief souls and blessing their dead daughter. They were beginning to curse dead thief souls but something went wrong. All doors were closed with horrible sounds at the time. The house were crackling and deeply horrible sound comes out. Priest decided to this house were disharmoned and haunted by bad spirits.Mother asked to Priest;"Before leave , please bless my daughter father!" And priest said;"I can't sorry, those haunted spirits doesn't let us pass to garden. I am sorry for that but if we try to pass , they will possess our souls immediately.". Family have to move another home so they did what they have to do. We shall see what happens to little boy in this house that under this demonic, haunted story.
